name: Body_Of_Work Gallery by Sam Thompson
description:
For use on Windows computers, "body_of_work" is a virtual gallery consisting of 180 original abstract digital artworks, placed alongside projections and amplified by an original music track, all created by me as part of my gallery debut.  

"body_of_work" was originally showcased physically in Bethlehem, PA, and I decided that I wanted to make the gallery accessible to anyone no matter where they are worldwide, so I delved into learning the basics of Unity to work on figuring out how to transmute it into a virtual experience, which I am happy to share with you here!
